meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #747.

td.p: Robert Horton, a computer salesman from Tampa (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,601)

tr.td: MOUNTAINS
SCREEN STARS
THE HUMAN BODY
STATISTICS
FOX HUNTING
"GOLD"
